ComicInfo.Summary:
The final sacrifice has been prepared...the portal to hell stands ready to be opened...Satan and his court rejoice. The end of the world is upon us and who ever thought it would start in a place as innocuous as Blue Ash, Ohio.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sami Kivela & Mohan Sivakami | 1 | B | Cover B | Anthony Spay & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Andrea Meloni & Ivan Nunes | 3 | D | Cover D | Gregbo Watson & Wes Hartman | 4 |
